title: The Life of a Brilliant, Suffering Scientist
description: Samanth Subramanian discusses “A Dominant Character,” his biography of J. B. S. Haldane, and Patrik Svensson talks about “The Book of Eels.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
